field.fieldname: case (select count(*) from ViewCRMCompanyAll b where b.companycategory='tblCMCompleteClient' and b.BillDate>=@condition:BillDate_s and b.BillDate<=@condition:BillDate_e and year(b.BillDate)=year(CRMClientReview.createTime) and month(b.BillDate)=month(CRMClientReview.createTime)) when 0 then 0 else convert(numeric(18, 2),count(CRMClientReview.BillNO)/(convert(numeric(18, 2),(select count(*) from ViewCRMCompanyAll b where b.companycategory='tblCMCompleteClient' and b.BillDate>=@condition:BillDate_s and b.BillDate<=@condition:BillDate_e and year(b.BillDate)=year(CRMClientReview.createTime) and month(b.BillDate)=month(CRMClientReview.createTime))))) end

SQL.text: select vbCrLf cast(year(CRMClientReview.createTime) as varchar(10))+'.'+cast(month(CRMClientReview.createTime) as varchar(10)) as createTime,vbCrLf case (select count(*) from ViewCRMCompanyAll b where b.companycategory='tblCMCompleteClient' and b.BillDate>=@condition:BillDate_s and b.BillDate<=@condition:BillDate_e and year(b.BillDate)=year(CRMClientReview.createTime) and month(b.BillDate)=month(CRMClientReview.createTime)) when 0 then 0 else convert(numeric(18, 2),count(CRMClientReview.BillNO)/(convert(numeric(18, 2),(select count(*) from ViewCRMCompanyAll b where b.companycategory='tblCMCompleteClient' and b.BillDate>=@condition:BillDate_s and b.BillDate<=@condition:BillDate_e and year(b.BillDate)=year(CRMClientReview.createTime) and month(b.BillDate)=month(CRMClientReview.createTime))))) end as CompanyNamevbCrLffrom CRMClientReviewvbCrLfleft join ViewCRMCompanyAll on ViewCRMCompanyAll.id=CRMClientReview.f_brothervbCrLfwhere 1=1 vbCrLf and ViewCRMCompanyAll.companycategory='tblCMCompleteClient'vbCrLf and (substring(CRMClientReview.createTime,1,10) >=?)vbCrLf and (substring(CRMClientReview.createTime,1,10) <=?)vbCrLfgroup by vbCrLf year(CRMClientReview.createTime),vbCrLf month(CRMClientReview.createTime)vbCrLfvbCrLf
